title: This modder made such a great change to Starfield's food it's actually making me hungry
description: It's kind of amazing how much presentation matters when it comes to meals.

title: Epic Games head of publishing strategy Sergiy Galyonkin has left the company: 'I am not a good fit for this new version of Epic'
description: Galyonkin joined Epic in 2016 but said the company now requires people "of a different kind."

title: 3 of the 5 top wishlisted Steam games are city builders, and I want to play them all
description: Despite sharing a genre, they're all vastly different games.

title: Baldur's Gate 3's last patch quietly clothed a formerly-nude cat, and some players are demanding their little naked man back
description: #NotMyMajesty?

title: You can finally have an entire Sea of Thieves server to yourself with the new Safer Seas game mode
description: The new mode, coming in December, will enable Sea of Thieves players to sail solo or with their friends.

title: Cocoon review
description: Cocoon makes incredible meals of puzzles within worlds that could have adorned prog rock album covers.

title: You can break Cyberpunk 2077's movement and become a flying V with this busted build
description: Why settle for netrunning when you can go airrunning with the right pairing of cyberware and perks?

title: After 3 years of silence, Kingpin Reloaded resurfaces with a new trailer and a December release date
description: The remaster of the 1999 cult classic was announced 2020, then delayed, and then disappeared completely.

title: You can already hack Ray Reconstruction into Cyberpunk 2077 without the path tracing limitation, but Nvidia promises to open it up officially soon
description: Ray Reconstruction makes Cyberpunk 2077 look absolutely stunning, but it can only be enabled with path tracing, or via some hacks.

title: Payday 3 developer promises '200+ QoL improvements' this month following an atrocious launch
description: Starbreeze also says matchmaking is "stable and has good performance" now.

title: I didn't know there were 'iconic' school bus designs until Bus Simulator licensed one
description: "An officially licensed Saf-T-Liner C2 school bus" is just a funny phrase.

title: Logitech Pro X Superlight 2 review
description: Hold it down or it'll float away.

title: I'm glad Cyberpunk 2077 is getting a sequel, but it really deserves more expansions
description: V and Johnny need to have more adventures together.

title: Grand Theft Auto 6 fans have become so desperate for information they've convinced themselves that the moon is teasing an upcoming reveal
description: I mean sure, why not?

title: Should you frame Yuri during Balls to the Wall in Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty?
description: This side mission gives you a difficult choice.

title: You've survived the end of the world—now Frostpunk 2 wants you to survive a population that doesn't get along
description: How do you build a utopia when everyone wants something different?

title: The same modder who fixed Starfield's inventory has now sorted out the rest of the UI
description: Not all heroes wear capes.

title: Paradox reveals Foundry, a procedurally-generated factory sim that looks like a mix of Factorio and Satisfactory, and you can play it next week
description: Start building your infinite factory when Foundry's demo appears during Steam Next Fest.

title: 10 years after launch, one player has nabbed every one of Final Fantasy 14's 2,751 achievements
description: A true Warrior of Light.

title: The Drifter is a point-and-click adventure that's also a fast-paced thriller
description: Adventure games are dread.

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer for #835 Monday, October 2
description: Today's Wordle: Help with solving Monday's puzzle.

title: Cyborg immersive sim Core Decay still has those System Shock, Deus Ex vibes in a brand new trailer
description: Dark conspiracies and multiple approaches to objectives are the order of the day.
